card.name: Mist Rias, Sonic Guardian
card.text: ■ Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Tajimal, Vizier of Aqua
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Multi ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ While battling a fire creature, this creature gets +4000 power.

card.name: Stronghold of Lightning and Flame
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Dione
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Creatures that have "speed attacker" can't attack on the turn they are put. ■ This creature can't attack.

card.name: Diamond Sword
card.text: ■ This turn, ignore any of your creature’s effects that would prevent them from attacking your opponent. ''(For example, ignore summoning sickness and card effects that say "This creature can't attack" or "This creature can't attack players". Your creatures can't attack creatures this way.)''

card.name: Secret Clocktower
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put a card into your hand, put one on the bottom of your deck, and the other on top of your deck.

card.name: Lord Reis, Wisdom Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever you put a creature that has "Blocker" into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Gaga Pikarian
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Hatchaki
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution creature that has "blocker" that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Byoito, Holy Cyber Protector
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Light or water cards that have "blocker" added to your hand from your shield zone get "shield trigger".

card.name: Violent Children
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone that cost 3 or less get "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's evolution creatures and creatures that have "speed attacker" are put into the battle zone tapped.

card.name: Ragnarok, the Clock
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, skip the rest of the turn.

card.name: Diehard Ryusei of Invincibility
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever one of your Dragons attack, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into its owner's graveyard. ■ When you would Prevents Defeat ■ When this creature is destroyed, this turn, you can't Prevents Defeat

card.name: Star Pippi
card.text: ■ Your light creatures may each cost up to 1 less to summon and your fire creatures may each cost up to 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Dragon's Sign
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put a non-evolution Light dragon creature that costs 7 or less from your hand. That creature gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Hibiki, Explosive Mirror
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent casts a spell during their turn, choose a card from your opponent's mana zone and put it into their graveyard.

card.name: Mirac, Time Ball
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Escape

card.name: Generarose, Red Rose Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 6 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Pikarie, Radiance Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Doremi, Time 1
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card.

card.name: Kernel, Blue Stagnation Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent’s creatures. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block.

card.name: Final Stop
card.text: ■ Until the end of your opponent's next turn, your opponent can't cast spells. ■ Draw a card.

card.name: Ur, Cleansing Elemental
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap or untap a creature in the battle zone.

card.name: Dachicco Churis
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, this turn, the next Beat Jockey you summon may cost up to 3 less. It can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Nagnag Churis
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle.

card.name: Appo Churis
card.text: ■ When this creature is destroyed, draw a card.

card.name: Hop Churis
card.text: ■ This creature can't attack if you didn't attack with another creature this turn.

card.name: Step Churis
card.text: ■ If you have 2 or more Beat Jockey in the battle zone, this creature gets "speed attacker". ''(Creatures that have "speed attacker" don't get summoning sickness.)

card.name: Bakugetto, Totsugeki Tank
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Orlilia, Flash of Justice
card.text: ■ You may untap this creature to change your opponent's creatures attack to this creature or one of your tapped creatures. ■ Labyrinth: If you have more shields than your opponent, they can't cast spells that cost 5 or less.

card.name: Maruhavaan, Red Attack Silver
card.text: ■ Sympathy: Creature that costs 3 or less ''(This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your creatures that cost 3 or less in the battle zone. It can't cost less than 1.)'' ■ Blocker ■ Whenever one of your creatures that cost 3 or less is destroyed, untap this creature. ■ Whenever one of your creatures that cost 4 or more would be destroyed, you may destroy one of your creatures that cost 3 or less instead.

card.name: Kenzan Charger
card.text: ■ Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a creature that has "blocker" or a spell, add it to your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck. ■ Charger

card.name: Surfer in the Sky
card.text:
■ Shield Trigger ■ Galaxyshield ■ Galaxy Go
■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to their hand.
